nodes.text: Sarrano Yard was a shipbuilding facility owned by the SoroSuub Corporation and located on Serres Sarrano on the planet Sullust. The facility was capable of producing spacecraft that were 77 meters or shorter.
Under the Galactic Empire, Sarrano Yard produced Ambassador-class luxury shuttles. After the Battle of Yavin, the Yard began to produce Cutlass-9 patrol craft that were used by the Rebel Alliance.
